meanings.definition: Not made smaller or more compact
meanings.sent1: The unshrunk shirt was too big for him.
meanings.sent2: She preferred unshrunk jeans for a comfortable fit.
meanings.sent3: The unshrunk sweater looked like a dress on him!
meanings.sent4: Her unshrunk enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The unshrunk fabric retained its original shape and size.

meanings.definition: Not reduced in size or volume
meanings.sent1: The unshrunk cotton sheets felt crisp and fresh.
meanings.sent2: He insisted on using unshrunk towels for maximum absorbency.
meanings.sent3: The unshrunk loaf of bread was comically oversized.
meanings.sent4: Her unshrunk collection of books filled the entire shelf.
meanings.sent5: The unshrunk balloon floated effortlessly in the air.
